findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet. These funds have been accumulated from fees collected from the contract.

findings.title: SU - Subtraction Underflow
findings.description: The contract contains subtraction expressions where the minuend is not checked if it is greater than subtrahend, which may cause underflow.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L03 - Redundant Statements
findings.description: Detect the usage of redundant statements that have no effect.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is necessary to remove unreachable or redundant code.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to stop or pause transactions.

findings.title: OCTD - Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: Contract owner lacks the ability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet. These funds have been accumulated from fees collected from the contract.

findings.title: ELFM - Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)

findings.title: MT - Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: Contract owner lacks the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to blacklist specific wallets from selling tokens.
